Get to know us

The mission for our platform is to create a tool that serves different purposes we believe everyone needs. The first solution is self-fulfillment: how many times do you hear people tell an insecure person to just be themselves and be happy with themselves? However, not many know who they actually are. So our first goal was to build confidence in personal identity.

The second solution was to create a motivational community. The higher you reach, the lonelier it gets at times. Our (upcoming) app serves as a personal assistant for lack of motivation, organizational issues, and time management.

Our vision is that if you are seeing results in your personal growth — whether that is getting the body that you want, the language you learned to speak, or painting — you have something to be proud of, and that builds confidence.

You will feel deeply fulfilled and happy in your own skin, because now you look in the mirror and see a winner. Like we saw in the very beginning when you started this journey.

Personal story

Since forever I struggled with many habits that held me back in life. I was a very chaotic person to begin with... Every year I made a couple of new year’s resolutions like: getting fit, eating healthy, learning a new language, and playing piano. I let the years fly by, and I was at the point of getting mentally and emotionally ill. I wanted results, I wanted to be secure, I wanted to enjoy my life and look in the mirror with confidence.

So, I started planning everything and gathering knowledge to get there. But I couldn't find the best tools to make this journey easier for me. I was seeking mental stability in a world so unstable, I was seeking a healthy lifestyle in a world so unhealthy, I was expecting the world to fulfill me where it only made me empty. So I wanted to invest in myself so deeply. I started analyzing myself, and looking for solutions to turn weaknesses into strengths and see the opportunities in life.

Because often we view life through the wrong lens; many people have all the tools to finish their goal, and many people have the tools to help others. Just be optimistic and view life through the lens of the BodyMindSoulCLUB.
